short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides fast access to millions of open and subscription research papers and books - using your institution subscriptions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GetFTR streamlines access to published research by signalling which content is accessible, either through an institution subscription or content is open, and by providing GetFTR smart links that bypass unnecessary steps in the access process

Secondary buttons added where content has been retracted or updated, providing timeline of changes

=== Terms and Conditions ===
